alert.note: Alert for Atchison (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 30 at 5:29PM CDT until May 30 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Kansas, including the following county, Atchison KS. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Atchison, Effingham, Lancaster, Muscotah, Farmington, Huron, Cummings and Arrington. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
